overview: On the surface, Gu Hai runs a high-end car dealership, privately carrying a smuggled car, selling defective parts and components, and controlling the illegal activities of underground cars. His men’s Lin Biao secretly swallowed two million and wanted to leave the city with his sister Lin Yao. Start a new life. However, Lin Biao was discovered by Gu Hai. Lin Biao did not want to say the whereabouts of the money. Gu Hai planned to arrest Lin Yao to threaten Lin Biao. At the same time, Lin Yao, who loves racing, is preparing for an underground racing...
title: The King of the Drift 2
